parameters.routeParams: The `brand` and `category` params in the path. The available values are as follows.

routes.name: User Subscriptions
routes.description:
::: warning
  This route requires username and password, therefore it's only available when self-hosting, refer to the [Deploy Guide](https://docs.rsshub.app/deploy/config#route-specific-configurations) for route-specific configurations.
:::

parameters.type: content type, can be video or image, default is video

routes.name: Posts
routes.description:
Sources

| Posts | Patreon | Pixiv Fanbox | Gumroad | SubscribeStar | DLsite | Discord | Fantia |
| ----- | ------- | ------------ | ------- | ------------- | ------ | ------- | ------ |
| posts | patreon | fanbox       | gumroad | subscribestar | dlsite | discord | fantia |

::: tip
  When `posts` is selected as the value of the parameter **source**, the parameter **id** does not take effect.
  There is an optinal parameter **limit** which controls the number of posts to fetch, default value is 25.

  Support for announcements and fancards:
  - Use `/:source/:id/announcements` to get announcements
  - Use `/:source/:id/fancards` to get fancards
:::

parameters.source: Source, see below, Posts by default
parameters.id: User id, can be found in URL

routes.name: Single Manga Feed
routes.description: MangaDex is an non-profit and ad-free manga reader offering high-quality images.

routes.name: MDList Feed
routes.description: Sepcific MangaDex MDList Feed

id.description: The list id of the manga list

private.description: (Query Param) Needed to access private lists, any value will be treated as true

requireConfig.name: MANGADEX_USERNAME
requireConfig.description: MangaDex Username, required when refresh-token is not set and the list is private

requireConfig.name: MANGADEX_PASSWORD
requireConfig.description: MangaDex Password, required when refresh-token is not set and the list is private

requireConfig.name: MANGADEX_CLIENT_ID
requireConfig.description: MangaDex Client ID, required when the list is private

requireConfig.name: MANGADEX_CLIENT_SECRET
requireConfig.description: MangaDex Client Secret, required when the list is private

requireConfig.name: MANGADEX_REFRESH_TOKEN
requireConfig.description: MangaDex Refresh Token, required when username and password are not set and the list is private

routes.name: Follows Feed
routes.description: Get the latest updates of all the manga you follow on MangaDex.

lang.description: The language of the followed manga

requireConfig.name: MANGADEX_USERNAME
requireConfig.description: MangaDex Username, required when refresh-token is not set

requireConfig.name: MANGADEX_PASSWORD
requireConfig.description: MangaDex Password, required when refresh-token is not set

requireConfig.name: MANGADEX_REFRESH_TOKEN
requireConfig.description: MangaDex Refresh Token, required when username and password are not set

routes.name: Logged User's Followed Mangas Feed
routes.description:
Fetches the feed of mangas that you follow on MangaDex whick are in the specified status.
CAUTION: With big amount of follows, it may take a long time to load or even fail.
It's recommended to use the `/mangadex/mdlist/:listId?` route instead for better performance, though it requires manual configuration.

type.description: The type of follows to fetch

requireConfig.name: MANGADEX_USERNAME
requireConfig.description: MangaDex Username, required when refresh-token is not set

requireConfig.name: MANGADEX_PASSWORD
requireConfig.description: MangaDex Password, required when refresh-token is not set

requireConfig.name: MANGADEX_REFRESH_TOKEN
requireConfig.description: MangaDex Refresh Token, required when username and password are not set
